Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 2 Piercing plus 9 Poison
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Longsword, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Longbow, Ranged Weapon Attack, Range: 150/600, Average Damage: 7 Piercing plus 4 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Drider makes 3 attacks, either with its Longsword or its Longbow.  It can replace one of those attacks with a Bite attack

Abilities.Ability 1: Fey Ancestry, The Drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the Drider to sleep
Abilities.Ability 2: Innate Spellcasting, The Drider has the ability to cast a few spells
Abilities.Ability 3: Spider Climb, The Drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check
Abilities.Ability 4: Sunlight Sensitivity, The Drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight while in sunlight
Abilities.Ability 5: Web Walker, The Drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing
